root: ^I know you said I shouldn't be sorry but-
^It's fine kid, don't give them even more reasons to worry about.
^I'm sure they're happy to know you're doing your best to help the village they loved.
^I'm sure of it. Here, I got the flowers already prepare, of course with a little bit of your help in gathering most of them.
^My wife and daughter would of been happy to see you.
^I think they can rest in peace knowing you're doing fine as well.
^I can tell you loved them a lot, the way you arranged the flowers can help express your feelings, even if they have passed away.
^Hey ki- err I mean... Hanae, wanna join me in paying respect to them.
